summary: An average boy who resents his mundane life is struck by lightning during a particularly violent thunderstorm. When he recovers from the ordeal, he discovers that he has telekinetic powers.
cast: Noah Reid|Stephany Jacobsen|James Marsters|Naoko Mori|Alona Tal|Andrea Martin|Brandon Jay McLaren|Antony Del Rio|Kyle Schmid|Craig Eldridge|Julian Richings|Sophi Knight|Tamara Hope|Dillon Casey|David Eisner|Lawrence Bayne|Jung-Yul Kim|Pedro Miguel Arce|Dalton Brown|Devika Singh|Matt Birman|Miguel Anthony|Neven Pajkic|Christopher Lee Clements|Jeff Teravainen
title: 3 pulgadas
